entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 03:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -17.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
